column1: Local Foods////Local Foods is a sandwich place. But it's not really a sandwich place. It's not like... Jimmy John's. Or Subway. Hell nah. It's a fresh hip cool liberal local organic innovative sandwich place. (I don't really know if they use organic ingredients
column2: but it feels like they do. It's the thought that counts.) And the clientele reflects this - it's a bunch of young 20-something college students and yuppies. So to contrast their chic-ness
column3: I'm going to keep this review gritty and vulgar.
